paper_keywords: compressive projection principal component analysis (CP PCA) MIMO channel feedback
paper_abstract: In this letter we apply recently proposed compressive projection principal component analysis (CPPCA) for MIMO channel feed back. A novel scheme with compressed feedback and efficient reconstrution is presented. Simulation results based on 3GPP spatial channel model (SCM) demonstrate the scheme is beneficial for large scale MIMO systems.
paper_title: Application of Compressive Projection Principal Component Analysis to MIMO Channel Feedback Scheme
